item.title: Dolores add a quote by Steve Wozniak
item.description: "If you love what you do and are willing to do what it takes, it's within your reach. And it'll be worth every minute you spend alone at night, thinking and thinking about what it is you want to design or build. It'll be worth it, I promise." -- Steve Wozniak

item.title: Dolores add a quote by Jeffrey Eugenides
item.description: "Biology gives you a brain. Life turns it into a mind." -- Jeffrey Eugenides

item.title: Dolores add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "I live my life in widening circles that reach out across the world." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Dolores add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Find out the reason that commands you to write; see whether it has spread its roots into the very depth of your heart; confess to yourself you would have to die if you were forbidden to write." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Dolores add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "Hope is the thing with feathers That perches in the soul And sings the tune without the words And never stops at all." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Dolores add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "That it will never come again is what makes life so sweet." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Dolores add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "If I read a book and it makes my whole body so cold no fire can ever warm me, I know that is poetry." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Dolores add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "A little Madness in the Spring Is wholesome even for the King." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Dolores add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "This is my letter to the world That never wrote to me" -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Dolores add a quote by Daphne Du Maurier
item.description: "Last night I dreamt I went to Manderley again." -- Daphne Du Maurier

item.title: Dolores add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "These woods are lovely, dark and deep, But I have promises to keep, And miles to go before I sleep, And miles to go before I sleep." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Dolores add a quote by Rabindranath Tagore
item.description: "Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky." -- Rabindranath Tagore

item.title: Dolores add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "You cannot find peace by avoiding life." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Dolores add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "For most of history, Anonymous was a woman." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Dolores add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "Lock up your libraries if you like; but there is no gate, no lock, no bolt that you can set upon the freedom of my mind." -- Virginia Woolf
